name: Rynth
description:
Rynth is an anxiety-inducing experience where you must collect enough medicine through a series of hallways in order to get yourself out of this terrifying nightmare. This game is not for the faint of heart.

Avoid the monsters lurking in the dark and whatever you do... DO NOT let them catch you. 

There are three different difficulty settings if you are feeling up to the challenge.

There are many updates to come so stay tuned!

Enjoy!
